price: Ó to ẹ̀yà ara rẹ papọ̀ sínú èyíkéyìí àwòrán tí Ó fẹ́.
arabic: فِيٓ أَيِّ صُورَةٖ مَّا شَآءَ رَكَّبَكَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fī ayyi ṣūratin mā shāa rakkabaka
